actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to increase the amount of outside earned income which a Member may accept, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to increase the amount of outside earned income which a Member may accept from 15 percent to 30 percent of a Member's aggregate salary. Deletes the limitation on the amount of honorarium a Member may accept and requires that honoraria be attributed to the calendar year in which it is received.

titles.title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to increase the amount of outside earned income which a Member may accept, and for other purposes.
